description:
This application is fun, but it's a workaround for the option that has been removed in GNOME, to choose what to do on lid close (do nothing, suspend, etc).

Personally in Fedora I edit the configuration file /etc/systemd/logind.conf, to uncomment HandleLidSwitch and set its value to "ignore".

Because when I'm away from keyboard, I always prefer to close my laptop screen, but I don't want to suspend my computer because there are some downloads/uploads or compilation in progress…
summary: GNOME should add back the option to choose what to do on lid close
